DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effect experimental sodium fluoride-silica dentifrice formulation , without zinc , remineralization enamel situ . Following remineralization phase , acid resistance new mineral form assess . Fluoride uptake remineralization phase also measure .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Experimental Dentifrices Remineralization Caries Lesions In-situ
DOC.criteria: Good general health clinically significant relevant abnormality medical history oral examination Participants maxillary dental arch suitable retention palatal appliance Participants take fluoride supplement Pregnant breastfeeding woman
